statusLine.command: bash -c 'input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".model.display_name"); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".workspace.current_dir"); project=$(basename "$cwd"); if [ -d "$cwd/.git" ]; then branch=$(git -c core.useBuiltinFSMonitor=false --git-dir="$cwd/.git" --work-tree="$cwd" branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); commit=$(git -c core.useBuiltinFSMonitor=false --git-dir="$cwd/.git" --work-tree="$cwd" rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null); [ -n "$branch" ] && [ -n "$commit" ] && echo "[$model] $project $branch $commit" || echo "[$model] $project"; else echo "[$model] $project"; fi'
